typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		wcs_sales_sk as string,
		wcs_item_sk as short,
		wcs_web_page_sk as double,
		wcs_user_sk as string,
		timestamp as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> clickstream
source(output(
		ProductID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		MakeFlag as boolean,
		FinishedGoodsFlag as boolean,
		Color as string,
		SafetyStockLevel as integer,
		ReorderPoint as integer,
		StandardCost as decimal(19,4),
		ListPrice as decimal(19,4),
		Size as string,
		SizeUnitMeasureCode as string,
		WeightUnitMeasureCode as string,
		Weight as decimal(8,2),
		DaysToManufacture as integer,
		ProductLine as string,
		Class as string,
		Style as string,
		ProductSubcategoryID as integer,
		ProductModelID as integer,
		SellStartDate as timestamp,
		SellEndDate as timestamp,
		DiscontinuedDate as timestamp,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> product
source(output(
		ProductCategoryKey as integer,
		ProductCategoryAlternateKey as integer,
		EnglishProductCategoryName as string,
		SpanishProductCategoryName as string,
		FrenchProductCategoryName as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> productcategory
source(output(
		ProductSubcategoryKey as integer,
		ProductSubcategoryAlternateKey as integer,
		EnglishProductSubcategoryName as string,
		SpanishProductSubcategoryName as string,
		FrenchProductSubcategoryName as string,
		ProductCategoryKey as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> productsubcategory
clickstream, product join(wcs_item_sk == ProductID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> mergewithproduct
mergewithproduct, productsubcategory join(ProductSubcategoryID == ProductSubcategoryKey,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> mergewithproductsubcategory
mergewithproductsubcategory, productcategory join(productsubcategory@ProductCategoryKey == productcategory@ProductCategoryKey,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> mergewithproductcategory
mergewithproductcategory select(mapColumn(
		timestamp,
		Name,
		EnglishProductSubcategoryName,
		EnglishProductCategoryName
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectFields
SelectFields aggregate(groupBy(clickdatetime = concat(toString(toDate(timestamp)), ' ', toString(hour(timestamp)), ':00'),
		EnglishProductCategoryName,
		EnglishProductSubcategoryName),
	Name = count(Name)) ~> AggregateByCategory
AggregateByCategory sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['ClickAggregateByCategory.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> adlssink
